scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run prepare-db && tsc-watch --onSuccess "node ./dist/src/index.js"
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run test:all
scripts.test:integration: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run test:_integration
scripts.test:integration:single: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run test:prepare:integration && npm run mocha
scripts.test:unit: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run mocha -- src/**/*.test.ts --exclude src/**/*.integration.test.ts
scripts.test:unit:single: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run mocha
scripts.//2: * Rest of those commands are used internally and should not be used directly!
scripts.db:test:create: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test sequelize --config='dist/src/config/database.js' db:create || true
scripts.db:test:drop: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test sequelize --config='dist/src/config/database.js' db:drop || true
scripts.test:all: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:prepare:integration: npm run build && npm run db:test:drop && npm run db:test:create && npm run prepare-db
scripts.test:_integration: npm run test:prepare:integration && npm run mocha -- src/**/*.integration.test.ts
scripts.test:ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ENV=test npm run mocha:ci
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && rsync -av --exclude='*.ts' src/** dist/src/
scripts.prepare-db: npm run migrate:copy && npm run db-clean && npm run migrate:db
